Climate.Critical_Factors: drought at flowering or just before flowering results in flower and pod drops, while rains during maturity impairs the grain quality of soyabean.

Soil.Best_Type: sandy loam having good organic matter content

Cropping_Seasons.Kharif: onset of monsoon or last week of June to first week of Jully
Cropping_Seasons.Spring: between 15th of February and 15th of March

Sowing.Method of sowing: Line sowing by seed drill followed as it needs less seeds/ha, weeding and hoeing may be done conveniently
Sowing.Seed treatment: Seeds are treated with rhizobium culture.

Fertilizers.Nitrogen_Note: Soyabean gives higher positive response to applied nitrogen over symbiotically fixed atmospheric nitrogen through its roots alone which proves that nitrogen fixed by soyabean roots is not enough for its and development. Crop is supplied with 10-15% of total nitrogen requirement
Application: 25-30 C.L.FYM at the time of sowing proved better results.
50 Kg N + 100 Kg P2O5, 20 kg sulphur per ha.
25 Kg Zinc sulphate and 10 Kg Borax should be applied.

Water requirement.Kharif_crop: In case of Kharif crop irrigation is not needed and it is grown rainfed.
Water requirement.Summer_crop: However during summer the crop can be grown only under assured irrigation and it needs about 5-6 irrigations.
Critical_growth_stages: Flowering pod initiation and bean filling stages are important from yield point of view

Cultivation Practices: At the time of sowing one deep ploughing two harrowings should be given tomaintain optimum moisture at sowing.

After care.Weeding: Keep plot weed free upto 40 days by one or two hoeings, two weedings upto 40 days.
After care.Herbicides: Herbicides such as Toke 25, 1.5 to 2 Kg/ha pre-emergence before sowing controls the weeds.

Crop Rotation and inter cropping.Inter_cropping: Inter cropping with Tur, Cotton, drilled paddy sorghum, cotton, sugarcane.
Crop Rotation and inter cropping.Rotation: It can be rotated with wheat, potato, gram, tobacco

Harvesting.Method: Crop harvested at proper stage by usual method, threshing machine.
